about_the_game:
Biomes: Survival Era

is a top-down open-world crafting survival game.


The first version will appear as a regular survival adventure in a map based on the biomes of North America.
You will fight against animals and also flee from them, as well as harvest plants and mine rocks in order to use their raw materials in the manufacture of new weapons, tools and clothing.

Features

  • Unreal Engine 5
  • Satisfy your hunger and thirst
  • Craft items and equipment
  • Various biomes with their native animal and plant species
  • Hunt creatures and harvest crops
  • Tame creatures that will accompany you on your adventures
  • day-night cycle
  • Random creature colors
  • And much more...

Add it to your Wishlist to never miss any news ^^

Please don't forget that everything can take a little longer with me, I'm the sole developer, artist, whatever is behind this game.

NEW STYLE

In 2024 I have started to work again on this game, but with a new style, which is never that half realistic from the video, but a more stylized style.
I have decided to do this because it needed a lot of time to create textures for the creatures and everything else, first you need a high-poly model to create normal maps, then a low-poly-model for the game and high quality textures (2k+), otherwise it would look everything blurry...
The new style makes it a lot easier, I have directly the game-model and a simple texture (256+) and everything else happens in engine, which decreases the time needed, from 9-12 hours to 1-2 hours.
Animations will be shared, all similar creatures have the same animations, nothing special anymore, combined with the new look, it´s a huge time improvement.

content_descriptors.notes:
You can kill enemies.
Human players can be naked when no armor is eqipped.
Animals are always naked.
